item.title: 24 Hours of Radio Art [2013]
item.description:
For 24 Hours of Radio Art this year I composed a new work, Shrug, inspired by Ayn Rand's Atlas Shrugged.
30 sub-compositions in 3 parts:
Part 1: 1. First Cracks Showing 2. Work Rewarded With Chains 3. Plots and Whispers 4. Corrupted Processes 5. The Amusement of Destruction 6. Obligations; Planted Seeds 7. Struggles Against Smears and Thefts 8. Triumph and Traitors 9. Obscenity and Nobility 10. Scorched Earth
Part 2: 1. Moral Consent Withheld 2. Virtue of Production 3. The Destroyer Slips By 4. Shrugging Off The Leeches 5. Consequences of Corruption 6. Slavery Mandated 7. Killing Robin Hood 8. The Difficulty of Letting Go 9. Love's Complications 10. The Desperation Of Need
Part 3: 1. Heaven On Earth 2. From Across The Divide 3. Broken Ideals 4. Rather the River Than the World 5. Infiltration 6. False Flag Riot 7. Making the Case 8. No Middle Ground 9. The Code of Death's Logical End 10. Clearing Away the Rubble
More information: http://maQLu.com
item.itunes:subtitle: maQLu - Shrug
